answers.answer: Free medical care is offered by IOM Romania. MedZirka provides free online and offline consultations from a family doctor, therapist, or pediatrician. The Red Cross Health Promotion Center offers free medical consultations and access to some medical services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The provided content states that IOM Romania provides free medical care, but it does not specify the exact access method for refugees.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the section under 'Medical assistance offered by IOM Romania to refugees from Ukraine'.

answers.answer: The provided content states that IOM Romania offers free medical care, but it does not specify the hours or days when this care is available.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the section under 'Medical assistance offered by IOM Romania to refugees from Ukraine'.

answers.answer: MedZirka clinic offers free online consultations from a family doctor, therapist, or pediatrician.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the section under 'Free medical consultations from the Ukrainian clinic MedZirka'.

answers.answer: To get medical services from MedZirka clinic, you need to fill in a declaration.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the section under 'Free medical consultations from the Ukrainian clinic MedZirka'.

answers.answer: The Red Cross Health Promotion Center provides free medical consultations and access to some medical services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the section under 'Free medical care at the Health Promotion Center from the Red Cross'.

answers.answer: The provided content states that the Red Cross Health Promotion Center offers medical services, but it does not specify its operating hours or days.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/free-medical-care and read the section under 'Free medical care at the Health Promotion Center from the Red Cross'.
